Tucson Prime felt responsible for the mess as did Rodimus Prime.  He thinks=
 back to the time when he did his best to cause a diversion that would have=
 allowed Rodimus to escape free of harm.  But instead of that happening, he=
 had been shot and taken off line before he had the chance to save him.  Fo=
r that he felt guilty.  He looks to Night Shift, who quickly gets the idea =
of what he's trying to tell him.

" Right, change of plans again. Here, gim=
me Windlord'n I'll make sure he gets outa here safely with Perceptor'n Nigh=
tlight."

Tucson Prime hands him Windlord as Night Shift takes the same gen=
tile approach as did he.  He looks to Perceptor.

" Okay, change of plans, =
we're outa here and they're stayn' behind.  C'mon, we gotta burn rubber!"

=
Tucson Prime then looks to Rodimus.

" No Rodimus, this isn't all your faul=
t.  A lot of it if not all of it, is actually my fault.  The day we fought =
off Hydras's lackies two years ago, I had managed to deal with the ones I w=
as fighting against and saw that you, Nightlight and Windlord were in despe=
rate need of help.  So I went as fast as I could, to try and divert enemy f=
ire away from you, but I failed to check a blind spot in my rear view mirro=
r, and I was shot from behind, rendering me inoperable and blind.  If I had=
 just taken more careful survey of what was around me, none of this, includ=
ing what happened to you, would never have happened.  Now, now is the time =
to make it up to you.  We'll fight them together.  Scorponok doesn't scare =
me, none of them do.  All right Jhiaxus, don't expect me to make this easy =
for you because I'm not!  As I've said to Scorponok before, I will not fold=
 to any of you, no matter what damages you instill on me!  

Outside the fo=
rtress, Rat Trap transforms into rat form and scrambles for thick brush, tr=
ying to virtually vanish into the vegitation in an alluding maneuver.  Mean=
while, Quickstride remains in equine form, and continues to kick, buck, sto=
mp, and even motion to bite the enemies if they get too close.  With his ea=
rs aback, smoke billows from his flairing nostrills.  As his hooves slam on=
 the ground the ground around them vibrates, due to the sheer force of his =
quick but strong movements.

"looks like these chumps are just itching ta b=
e turned inta scrap yard material!"

Rat Trap tries an evasive maneuver whi=
le scampering in a figure eight pattern beneath his enemies, hoping that th=
ey'd accidentally crash into each other, due to the dizzing motions he's ma=
king.

" Then allow me ta help.  I may not have the umph you got, but I cer=
tainly got the brains for the job.. "

 a stop.

 and

ponok who was still in Scorpion mode. Scourge stepped out as well,

ke the others his weapons drawn.

d clearly into the tunnel, "It
> would seem we have found Perceptor after a=
ll Cyclonus." Jhiaxus said,
> his face was cold as he spoke, yet with a hin=
t of some dark humor,
> "Consorting with the enemy are we?" his voice was c=
onfident, almost

> 
> Unknown to most, =
while Jhiaxus was talking, Cyclonus was transmitting
> this to Hydras, maki=
ng sure he heard it all.
>

eptor, "Its too late for
> anything else now. "I will hold them so you can =
get away! Get
> Nightlight and Windlord out of here! This is my mess, and I=
 will

cepticons.
